__e: "'There's not a whole lot of logic in the way I live my life.

Perhaps it is true that no logic can be found in the human heart.
Unless you give me a logical reason why you like him more...
I mean, is that, uh, some kinda small-town logic, or are you just tired of doing your job?
That's what you'd think as at 20, but he's 12!
My logic is uncertain where my son is concerned.

I think it's a hell of a lot easier for people like you to believe there's a logical explanation to things they can't understand.
I always knew there had to be more to life than just logic and reason.
God, you've known him forever... and he's great and fun, and it makes sense, and...
